title: Spaghetti all'Arrabbiata
subtitle: A fiery Roman classic with garlic and chili
steps: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook spaghetti al dente.
Warm olive oil; gently sauté garlic and chili until fragrant.
Add tomatoes, simmer 10 minutes; season with salt.
Toss in spaghetti and parsley; serve immediately.

title: Weeknight Chickpea Curry
subtitle: Creamy, quick, and comforting
steps: Sauté onion in oil until soft; add garlic and curry powder.
Stir in tomatoes and coconut milk; simmer 10 minutes.
Add chickpeas; simmer 5 more minutes; season to taste.

title: Classic Fluffy Pancakes
subtitle: Weekend favorite, endlessly customizable
steps: Whisk dry ingredients; add milk, egg, butter; mix until just combined.
Cook scoops on a hot griddle until bubbles form; flip and finish.
